org.gvsig.raster.cache.tile.provider

Interface CacheStruct

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    BingMapsCacheStruct, GoogleMapsCacheStruct, OSMCacheStruct, WMTSCacheStruct

    public interface CacheStruct
    Structure of a cache service

      • getTileList

        List<Tile> getTileList(Rectangle2D r)
        Gets the list of tiles inside of selected area in pixels. This method is only valid for the real level. Don't use with levels of resolution.
        Parameters:

        Returns:
